short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select PR templates by fixed file names (FEATURE.md, FIX.md)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1. Add the template files named FEATURE.md and FIX.md to the [YOUR_REPOSITORY]/.github/PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE path.
2.Open a new pull request, check the select box to the left of the Create pull request button.
